summary: You can summon the Ysgramor\'s soul from Sovngarde.
descriptionHtml:
Sorry,I\'m not an English speaker,so not good at English.

You can call Ysgramor of Nord Hero!
The force of him is worthy to the name of the Hero,and being more stronger as you are.

Spell Tome is set above the long table in Hall of Valor.(look at the image)
So you have to clear the\"Sovngarde\" quest to learn this spell.

In addition,Wuuthrad is stronger than vanilla.
You can give more damage to elves.

Let\'s become the Nordic Hero together Real Hero!
author: metametroid
